Moo::Animation

Moo::Animation Class Reference

The animation class is a collection of channelbinders, these channelbinders bind together a node and an animation channel so that we can animate a node hierarchy. More...

class AnimationManager

Detailed Description

The animation class is a collection of channelbinders, these channelbinders bind together a node and an animation channel so that we can animate a node hierarchy.

This method blends this animation into the node hierarchy.

Parameters:
blendCookie the cookie of the current blend
frame the frame to play back

ChannelBinder * Moo::Animation::itinerantRoot (  )  const

This method returns the itinerant root of the animation.

The channel closest to the root that actually moves.

Returns:
the channelbinder for the itinerant root.

float  oframe,
float  nframe,
float  bframe,
float  eframe 
)

This method ticks this animation.

Note that unlike with the animate methods, frame numbers here should not wrap around if the animation is being looped.
